subject: Logs
msgSnippet: I m using junit3.6 framework .As i run a testcase , I expect a report ( log file) to be created in the c: junitLogs directory (I ve created one in c: ) . But
messageBody:
I'm using junit3.6 framework .As i run a testcase , I expect a report ( log
file) to be created in the c:\junitLogs directory (I've created one in c: )
. But no log file is being created even after successful testacase run !
"c:\junitLogs" is also in the classpath ! What should I do to get junit log
report ?

-sumu
